account_sid.description: The unique identifier of the Twilio account associated with the application.

api_version.description: The version of the Twilio API being used for the application.

date_created.description: The date and time when the application was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the application was last updated.

friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name assigned to the application for identification.

message_status_callback.description: The URL where status updates for outgoing messages will be sent.

sid.description: A unique identifier for the application.

sms_fallback_method.description: The HTTP method used to send a fallback URL if an error occurs during SMS delivery.

sms_fallback_url.description: The URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs during SMS delivery.

sms_method.description: The HTTP method used to send SMS messages for the application.

public_application_connect_enabled.description: Indicates whether public application connect is enabled for the application.

sms_status_callback.description: The URL where status updates for incoming SMS messages will be sent.

sms_url.description: The URL that Twilio will request when receiving an incoming SMS message.

status_callback.description: The URL where status updates for calls will be sent.

status_callback_method.description: The HTTP method used to send status updates for calls.

uri.description: The URI of the application resource.

voice_caller_id_lookup.description: Indicates whether or not caller ID information will be looked up for incoming calls.

voice_fallback_method.description: The HTTP method used to send a fallback URL if an error occurs during voice call handling.

voice_fallback_url.description: The URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs during voice call handling.

voice_method.description: The HTTP method used for voice call handling.

voice_url.description: The URL that Twilio will request for voice call handling.
